gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Thunder 135, Mavericks 86
gameRecap.excerpt: The Thunder defeated the Mavericks, 135-86. Shai Gilgeous-Alexander recorded 15 points and six assists in 16 minutes of work for the Thunder, while Chet Holmgren added 13 points and nine rebounds in the victory. Brandon Williams led all scorers with 22 points, along with five rebounds and three assists for the Mavericks in the losing effort. The Thunder finish the regular season at 57-25, while the Mavericks finish 50-32.
